entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lytton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:41 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lytton 08:53 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow changing to rain this morning. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this morning. Rainfall amount 10 mm except 30 mm near Boston Bar. Wind south 20 km/h. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of snow before morning. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain in the morning. Snow level rising to 1600 metres in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
